title: Graphs on Doctorate Degrees - evaluate data

content.question: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one specific contribution made by an African American to scientific or technological advances after 1900. Describe one conclusion that can be drawn from the data in the graphs. Explain how changes in the 1950s and 1960s provide a helpful context for understanding the data in the graphs.

frqParts.text: Respond to parts A, B, and C. Describe one specific contribution made by an African American to scientific or technological advances after 1900. Describe one conclusion that can be drawn from the data in the graphs. Explain how changes in the 1950s and 1960s provide a helpful context for understanding the data in the graphs.

topic.text: 4.4: Discrimination, Segregation, and the Origins of the Civil Rights Movement

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
